description: portrait of a figure with dark red face and round bright green eyes; figure wears a garment extending over head like a hood or head scarf in medium and light green and white, with row of large red dots/buttons on front and red trim at cuffs and light green dots/buttons beneath chin; medium green hands with all five fingers--including thumbs--nearly the same length; primitive style; thick pigments; tan frame with decorative moldings

signed: ULC, in black: E / dd / y
title: Untitled
